artist: El Lissitzky (Lazar Markovich Lissitzky) Hans (Jean) Arp Published by Eugen Rentsch Verlag, Zurich
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: Book of photographs of works by numerous 20th century artists; typography and printed paper covers (over board) designed by Lissitzky.
medium: Photographic reproductions, typography, and letterpress; bound in color-printed paper over boards
title: Die Kunstismen / Les ismes de l'Art / The Isms of Art, 1914-1924
